title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' Week 15 NFL Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Urban Firing Fallout
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - 'Sharp or Square' Week 15 NFL Picks, 'Fake Q's, Real Answers" on Urban Firing Fallout
description:
Colin does "Fake Questions, Real Answers" on Urban Meyer's firing and why it reveals some harsh truths about sports (3:00). Then the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 15 picks are "sharp" or "square". They look at Falcons/49ers (11:00), Texans/Jaguars (13:00), Bengals/Broncos (15:00), WFT/Eagles (17:00), Packers/Ravens (18:00), Patriots/Colts (22:00), Titans/Steelers (24:00), Seahawks/Rams (25:00), and Raiders/Browns (28:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
